title: Lore of the land (PC & MAC)
creator_credit: Adele Howard, Multimedia 21 Fund - Cinemedia and Fraynework Multimedia
brief_description: The land we live in shapes our lives and holds the story of our relationship with its vast mystery. This CD ROM is an invitation to explore and understand the Aboriginal love of the land. Take a journey through new cultural insights, Australian landscapes and Indigenous voices. It is designed to encourage us to live in harmony with each other and with the land we call home. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Power Macintosh system 7.6.6 or later, 32MB RAM, 40 MB free HD space, 640 X 480 display (set to thousands of colours), 4 X CD ROM or better. IBM PC and Compatible: Pentium 200 or better, Windows 95 or later, 32MB RAM, 40MB free HD space, 640 X 480 SVGA display set to 16-bit colour (thousands), 4 X CD ROM. To run the videos on this CD ROM, you will need to instal Apple Quicktime Version 4 on your computer (contained on CD ROM).
